;----Level 0 (Ground-Level)----
;----L0 RHW-2 (0x5700)----

;DxO and DxD T Fix (TD5)
;DxO

;----- diagonal intersection smoothing -----
; -> diag rhw-2 into ortho road
0x57605100,0,0,0x57000200,2,0=0x57605100,0,0,0x57000500,3,1
